reqs: For graduate students (undergraduates register in MUSC 163 001). All students must be available for all three (3) weekly rehearsals. OPEN TO NON-MUSIC STUDENTS. For most ensembles an audition is required to secure your place, during which you play or sing a prepared piece for the conductor. Auditions take place at the beginning of each academic year. Additional information, including downloadable excerpts for each instrument/voice, can be found here: http://www.music.ubc.ca/student-ensembles.html. Come in and sign up for audition times at the Music Office in late August or if you are unavailable to come in person, call our reception desk at 604-822-3113.
